summary: Project to add a simple interactive first-entry mini-game prompt ("Do you love me") with Yes/No options where the No option moves/jumbles to encourage selecting Yes.

existing_features.title: Add a first-entry prompt overlay that appears before revealing the Valentine page content, asking the user “Do you love me?” with exactly two options: “Yes” and “No”, and keep all other existing page sections and behavior unchanged once the user proceeds.

Implement the “No” option behavior so that when the user attempts to select “No”, the “No” button moves/jumbles vertically (up/down) within the prompt area to avoid being selected, while the “Yes” button remains stable and can be selected normally to proceed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add first-entry mini-game prompt: "Do you love me" with Yes/No; selecting No makes the No option move/jumble (up/down) so only Yes is easily selectable; keep rest of app/site unchanged.

projectName: Add first-entry “Do you love me?” mini-game with evasive No button
